description: This is for people who want to increase their consultative sales skills and also for people who have to sell, but don't want to be seen as a salesperson. For example, this workshop has been taught to engineers, architects, doctors, lawyers, consultants, realtors, financial advisors, insurance agents and other business people who need to be superb at high-level, professional consultative sales, but don’t really want to “sell.”
descriptionMD: How to Dramatically Increase your Sales Success
name: Consultative Sales
subtitle: Consultative Sales

episodes.description: A brief video with a course overview to help you make a good decision about whether this would be the right program for you.
episodes.title: Introduction
episodes.transcript:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.622 --> 00:00:04.337
John Spence, trusted consultant,
respected advisor,

2
00:00:04.337 --> 00:00:08.888
experienced strategist,
passionate speaker, well-read author,

3
00:00:08.888 --> 00:00:14.371
a top 100 business thought leader helping
executives achieve success everyday.

4
00:00:14.371 --> 00:00:17.891
>> Hello, my name is John Spence and I'd
like to take a few minutes to share with

5
00:00:17.891 --> 00:00:21.246
you what this course is about so
you can make a good decision about whether

6
00:00:21.246 --> 00:00:24.570
it's right for you and
would be a good investment for you.

7
00:00:24.570 --> 00:00:26.560
This is my consultative sales course.

8
00:00:26.560 --> 00:00:30.010
I've taught this class to many
companies in the Fortune 100,

9
00:00:30.010 --> 00:00:31.110
even some in the Fortune 10,

10
00:00:31.110 --> 00:00:35.870
and also to hundreds of people from
small to medium-sized companies.

11
00:00:35.870 --> 00:00:39.380
Its three key ideas that
you want to know about it.

12
00:00:39.380 --> 00:00:46.121
Number one is this is a course built if
you want to be seen as a trusted advisor,

13
00:00:46.121 --> 00:00:51.851
a partner, a peer, a team member
to your customer slash client.

14
00:00:51.851 --> 00:00:55.784
And the people that usually take this
course are either seasoned salespeople, or

15
00:00:55.784 --> 00:00:59.831
folks that have been selling already, that
want to hone their skills, get better,

16
00:00:59.831 --> 00:01:03.430
be much more of a consultant, and
get closer to their customers.

17
00:01:03.430 --> 00:01:07.500
And then there's a lot of people I've
taught this class to that have to interact

18
00:01:07.500 --> 00:01:11.942
with customers and clients and have to
sell, but they don't really see themselves

19
00:01:11.942 --> 00:01:15.160
as salespeople or don't want to
see themselves as salespeople.

20
00:01:15.160 --> 00:01:19.090
And that's engineers, architects, people
in the medical industry, things like that

21
00:01:19.090 --> 00:01:23.850
where yes I have to talk to customers, but
I don't want to be seen as a salesperson.

22
00:01:23.850 --> 00:01:27.260
So if either one of those matches you,
someone who wants to get better as

23
00:01:27.260 --> 00:01:31.290
a consultative salesperson, or someone
that has to sell but doesn't really

24
00:01:31.290 --> 00:01:35.220
want to be a salesperson, this should
be an absolutely superb course for you.

25
00:01:35.220 --> 00:01:38.430
There's something else important
to know about this course which is

26
00:01:38.430 --> 00:01:42.450
I only focus on stuff that
really works in the real world.

27
00:01:42.450 --> 00:01:46.550
I've been teaching this class for
about 20 years all over the world.

28
00:01:46.550 --> 00:01:50.350
In the early part of my career I worked
with mostly Fortune 100 companies,

29
00:01:50.350 --> 00:01:53.230
helping them close deals
of $100 million or larger.

30
00:01:53.230 --> 00:01:57.749
The same ideas that work there work in the
smallest company with two or three people.

31
00:01:57.749 --> 00:02:00.479
And again,
most of this is business to business, but

32
00:02:00.479 --> 00:02:03.990
there is some application
to business to consumer.

33
00:02:03.990 --> 00:02:06.670
Also, I've owned my own companies for

34
00:02:06.670 --> 00:02:09.550
several years, and
I am the lead salesperson.

35
00:02:09.550 --> 00:02:10.650
I'm out in the field too.

36
00:02:10.650 --> 00:02:13.240
Not only have I learned this stuff and
I taught it, but

37
00:02:13.240 --> 00:02:16.710
I have to use it every
week to close deals.

38
00:02:16.710 --> 00:02:21.600
What that means is no fluff,
no silly stories, only things you can use

39
00:02:21.600 --> 00:02:25.170
right away to have a dramatic positive
impact on your sales success.

40
00:02:25.170 --> 00:02:28.400
So if that sounds like it's
what you're looking for,

41
00:02:28.400 --> 00:02:30.020
I hope you'll invest in this course.

42
00:02:30.020 --> 00:02:31.840
But I do want to let you know that if for

43
00:02:31.840 --> 00:02:35.220
any reason, you don't feel
like you got value out of it,

44
00:02:35.220 --> 00:02:38.890
all you have to do is send us an email and
we will refund your money immediately.

45
00:02:38.890 --> 00:02:41.810
So I hope this helped you make a good
decision about whether this course is

46
00:02:41.810 --> 00:02:43.690
right for you or not.

47
00:02:43.690 --> 00:02:47.720
Again, I'll tell you there's gonna be
lots of great ideas, stuff that works.

48
00:02:47.720 --> 00:02:50.574
I'm gonna overwhelm you
with great information, and

49
00:02:50.574 --> 00:02:53.984
I hope you'll make a decision to
spend a couple hours with me, and

50
00:02:53.984 --> 00:02:56.602
let me help you be a more
successful salesperson.

episodes.description: Consultative sales is not like regular sales. This session explains how to position yourself as a trusted advisor, partner and peer to your customers, clearly differentiating yourself from other salespeople.
episodes.title: Section One: The Right Mindset

episodes.description: Instructions for how to develop a step-by-step plan that will assist you in becoming one of the most respected and successful salespeople in your industry.
episodes.title: Section Two: How to be the Best in the World

episodes.description: The core elements of what it takes to be a highly effective consultative salesperson. This session touches on advanced questioning skills, listening skills and how to take superb notes.
episodes.title: Section Three: Tools of the Trade

episodes.description: Additional skills that will help you take your sales success to a higher level including handling objections, using social media to sell and how to generate more referrals.
episodes.title: Section Four: More Key Sales skills
